SummaryEnglish: The story centers around an elementary school teacher who is so stupid that he cannot even write his own name. He does whatever he likes in his classroom. Plus, by all appearances, he is not human.

1.TitleEnglish: And His Name Is Pascal-Sensei / Perfect Plate
1.SummaryEnglish: Hayato's 4th grade class returns from spring break to find they have a strange new homeroom teacher. What chaos and hijinks will ensue? Meanwhile, two adventurers embark on an epic quest in a parallel fantasy universe.

2.TitleEnglish: Terror! 100% Physical Exam / Perfect Plate / 1% Pascal
2.SummaryEnglish: Today is class 4-1's physical exam, but someone doesn't seem very excited? What strange tests await Pascal's students? Meanwhile, our adventurers learn about being an adult and taking responsibility, and Hayato and Pascal investigate some footage.

3.TitleEnglish: My Name Is Transfer Student / Perfect Plate
3.SummaryEnglish: There's a new transfer student in town, and boy is he a doozy! Will his stuck-up attitude prove too much for Pascal and the rest of class 4-1? Meanwhile, a servant of the dark lord is haunted by demons from his past.

4.TitleEnglish: Legendary Delinquent, Tachibana Hikaru / Perfect Plate / Kitano Yuusuke-kun's Code Lesson
4.SummaryEnglish: With the return of the legendary delinquent Tachibana Hikaru, Pascal is in for the showdown of his life! Meanwhile, a young entrepreneur discovers the risks of product testing, and Kitano Yuusuke sends a message.

5.TitleEnglish: Beware of Pop Quizzes! / Perfect Plate
5.SummaryEnglish: Pop quizzes are supposed to be surprising, but can class 4-1 handle the surprises Pascal has in store for them? Meanwhile, a weary traveler finds the strength to continue in an unlikely place.

6.TitleEnglish: Also Known as May Sickness / Perfect Plate / Pascalinglish Straight Outta America
6.SummaryEnglish: Class 4-1 comes to school one day to discover that their teacher Pascal is suffering from a terrible illness: May Sickness! Meanwhile, a wandering hero faces the injustice of those who abuse their power, and Pascal teaches how to correctly speak English.

7.TitleEnglish: This Is Birthday Party / Perfect Plate
7.SummaryEnglish: It's Steve's birthday, and everyone's invited! Except Pascal—who shows up anyway, and with quite the present! Meanwhile, a weary adventurer pays the price for getting what he wants.

8.TitleEnglish: The Faculty Room You Don't Get to See / Perfect Plate / A Practical Hieroglyphics Lesson
8.SummaryEnglish: Have you ever wondered what goes on in the school's faculty room? The students of 4-1 discover more than they bargained for! Meanwhile, a fallen hero confronts his dark side, and Steve learns the wisdom of the ancients.

9.TitleEnglish: The Seating Change of Destiny / Perfect Plate / Kitano Yuusuke-kun's Code Lesson
9.SummaryEnglish: A student's seat in the classroom can change the course of their school life, but class 4-1 finds themselves playing musical chairs with more than just classroom seats. Meanwhile, a ravaged wanderer finds warmth in the wasteland, and Hayato learns about communicating with friends.

10.TitleEnglish: Danger! Keep Out! Zoo Classroom / Perfect Plate / 1% Pascal
10.SummaryEnglish: If you thought your school was a zoo, wait till you see what Pascal-sensei has brought to class today! Meanwhile, a young ruler finds the courage to stand up for himself, and Chika tests her observational skills.

11.TitleEnglish: Space Evacuation Drill / Perfect Plate / A Practical Hieroglyphics Lesson
11.SummaryEnglish: Students must be prepared for any emergency that might happen at school. But Pascal's safety drills turn out to be out of this world! Meanwhile, a pretender learns the consequences of his hubris, and Hayato learns from the wisdom of the ancients.

12.TitleEnglish: How to Raise a Pascal Junior / Perfect Plate / Pascalinglish Straight Outta America
12.SummaryEnglish: Ever wish you had a handbook for how to raise a child? Pascal learns that it's not as handy as it seems! Meanwhile, a villain gone astray learns to accept his identity, and Pascal teaches some more "correct" English.

13.TitleEnglish: Mysterious Transfer Student, Ijuuin Kirari / Perfect Plate / 1% Pascal
13.SummaryEnglish: Class 4-1 has a new student, but she doesn't seem to be making any friends! Can the class find any common ground with her? Meanwhile, a peek into the future reveals hunger and loss, and Iwata learns the importance of hair hygiene.

14.TitleEnglish: Follow Him!! Pascal-sensei / Perfect Plate / Yum! Pascal Gourmet
14.SummaryEnglish: Pascal's taken off early for summer break, but where could he have gone? Can Steve's super-sleuth hound piece together the clues? Meanwhile, a stranger in a strange land finds society shuns his customs, and Pascal shows you don't need to be rich to eat like a king.

15.TitleEnglish: 100% Dangerous Pool / Perfect Plate / A Practical Hieroglyphics Lesson
15.SummaryEnglish: The sun's out, and the school pool's open! But class 4-1 soon finds that Pascal's swimming lessons have them going off the deep end! Meanwhile, a would-be hero learns that false pretenses can't fool those who matter, and Steve receives the wisdom of the centuries.

16.TitleEnglish: Enjoy! Nature Camp Part One / Perfect Plate / Pascalinglish Straight Outta America
16.SummaryEnglish: It's time for the big school event: nature camp! Pascal's behaving like a proper teacher for once, but will it last? Meanwhile, the heir to a kingdom finds the light of bravery in the darkness, and Mr. DiCaprio learns how not to be rude in English.

17.TitleEnglish: Enjoy! Nature Camp Part Two / Perfect Plate / 1% Pascal
17.SummaryEnglish: Nature camp continues, with class 4-1 now in dire straits! Will they succumb to Pascal's devious machinations? Meanwhile, a traveler journeys through time and meets a traveler who journeys through time and meets a traveler who journeys through time and meets a traveler who journeys through time and meets a traveler who journeys through time and meets a traveler who journeys through time and...

18.TitleEnglish: A Midsummer`s Idle Pascal / Perfect Plate / 1% Pascal
18.SummaryEnglish: Did you spend your summer break being productive, or just idling around? Pascal proves that you can even take idling to new heights! Meanwhile, a tenacious challenger learns that attempting the impossible will only lead to ruin, and Kitano Yuusuke senses more than anyone bargained for.

19.TitleEnglish: Pascal-Produced Fireworks Festival / Perfect Plate / Kitano Yuusuke-kun`s Code Lesson
19.SummaryEnglish: Fireworks festivals are the best part of summer break! The food, the games, the show... but what happens when Pascal's in the mix? Meanwhile, new money gets a first-class experience, and Kitano Yuusuke sends an invaluable message.

20.TitleEnglish: Pascal-sensei`s Summer Vacation / Perfect Plate / Yum! Pascal Gourmet
20.SummaryEnglish: Looks like summer was draining for Pascal, but will his video diary explain what happened or just raise more questions? Meanwhile, even a land of terrors can become a world of joy, and Pascal reveals the secret to eating fresh fruit out of season.

21.TitleEnglish: Crisis! The Battle for Ice Cream! / Perfect Plate / Pascalinglish Straight Outta America
21.SummaryEnglish: When school lunch includes an ice cream, it's a special treat. But things get hairy when there's one extra left over, and class 4-1 tries to decide who gets it. Meanwhile, a hero is confronted with a nigh insurmountable task on his path to greatness, and Pascal teaches the right way to pronounce potato.

22.TitleEnglish: Revenge! Super Pascal / Perfect Plate / Pascalinglish Straight Outta America
22.SummaryEnglish: A good teacher will do anything for his students, and the same goes for Pascal. When Steve is kidnapped, can Super Pascal save the day? Meanwhile, a man from another age discovers modern cuisine, and Pascal starts an American car wash.

23.TitleEnglish: The Truth of Kitano Yuusuke / Perfect Plate / Yum! Pascal Gourmet
23.SummaryEnglish: Kitano Yuusuke is just another normal, perfectly human student, but he's behaving awfully strangely today. As humans do. Probably some human chemical destabilizing his human brain. Meanwhile, a lord of darkness faces his greatest challenge yet, and Pascal serves up some café au lait, sans the café.

24.TitleEnglish: The Secret Pascal Room / Perfect Plate / A Practical Hieroglyphics Lesson
24.SummaryEnglish: Pascal's left the assignments back in his office, so Hayato and the gang go help him retrieve them. No, not the faculty room. The Pascal room... and who knows what waits inside? Meanwhile, a mad scientist does not rip off Dragonball Z, and Chika learns the wisdom of the ancients.

25.TitleEnglish: Attack of the Dark Lord of P.E. / Perfect Plate / Pascalinglish Straight Outta America
25.SummaryEnglish: It's school Sports Day, which of course means the arrival of a fearsome, catty alien from outer space! Can Iwata save the Earth from destruction, while avoiding his inevitable Kenny-like fate? Meanwhile, a great hero is reminded of the true strength of youth, and more pointless bilingual puns are presented for your ostensible enjoyment.

26.SummaryEnglish: Ever wonder what the 100% in the title means? Probably not, but you're getting an answer anyway! Find out what happens when the hitherto nonexistent meter above Pascal's head drops to 0%! Meanwhile, a fierce final showdown is fought against not-Gollum on not-Mount-Doom, and the resident delinquent takes a stab at 1% Pascal.

27.TitleEnglish: Battle for the King of Home Ec!! / Perfect Plate / Yum! Pascal Gourmet
27.SummaryEnglish: It's time for class 4-1 to put their cooking skills to the test in this Home Ec throwdown! Who will create the best egg dish? Wait... what happened to the egg? Meanwhile, a new start reminds us of the importance of using protection, and Kirari gets a taste of high-class living.

28.TitleEnglish: I Am Shadow Warrior / Perfect Plate / Pascal Poetry
28.SummaryEnglish: What could be more obnoxious than one Steve? How about two? Steve discovers he's had a shadowy body double all along, who now wants to be something more! Meanwhile, a sinister conspirator discovers the persuasive power of a turn of phrase, and Pascal composes a verse to help a student in need.

29.TitleEnglish: Bankrupt?! The Kanamori Group / Perfect Plate / Pascal Poetry
29.SummaryEnglish: Kanamori Steve comes to school in rags as the Kanamori Group goes bankrupt.

30.TitleEnglish: Who Is the Savior!? / Perfect Plate / 1% Pascal
30.SummaryEnglish: The kids end up in a parallel dystopian world where chaos reigns. Will they be able to find their way back to their own world?

31.TitleEnglish: We're Doing Social Studies Field Trips / Perfect Plate / Yum! Pascal Gourmet
31.SummaryEnglish:
Today, Pascal-sensei takes the class out to see how a factory operates.
Maybe the choice of the ramen factory was not a coincidence, as Pascal-sensei somehow ends up in the production line...

32.TitleEnglish: It's Pascal from the Comic Duo! / Perfect Plate / Pascal Poetry
32.SummaryEnglish:
Pascal-sensei is apparently also a member of a comedy duo, and is so confident that he doesn't need to practice.
But once on stage, that confidence seems to have turned into something much much less impressive...

33.TitleEnglish: Idol Activity Pasmin! / Perfect Plate / Pascal Poetry
33.SummaryEnglish:
What do you spend your time on when you have a day off?
Well, get ready for this, because Pascal-sensei spends this time being an idol!
In another world, a dangerous riceball makes an appearance.

34.TitleEnglish: Pascal-sensei's First Class / Perfect Plate / Announcement of the Absolutely Best Student!
34.SummaryEnglish:
Today, Pascal-sensei tells the class how he began his journey as a teacher.
Then why is he talking about synchronized swimming?
Later, the award winners for the best students in 4 categories are announced.
Who will win the ultimate award?!

35.TitleEnglish: Kinoeda Grade School Decisive Battle at the Top Part One / Perfect Plate
35.SummaryEnglish:
The thing that Pascal-sensei unveiled to the students of Kinoeda Grade School today was not a surprise test,
but something else entirely: a surprise tag battle.
Will the students be able to best their opponents against all the odds and make it through the preliminaries?!

36.TitleEnglish: Kinoeda Grade School Decisive Battle at the Top Part Two / Perfect Plate
36.SummaryEnglish:
The final matches of the tournament for the top of the school are on!
Who are the mysterious fighters behind the mask? And where did the third masked fighter come from?
Who will prevail and take the crown?!
